data.title: Players to watch at NBA Summer League: All eyes on Bronny James
data.meta_description: If YouTube or TikTok highlights weren't enough to really understand who your team drafted, the NBA Summer League has got you covered. Kai Gammage offers up who to watch for as the annual showcase tips off on Saturday.
